Parameter.name: popDesitnation
Parameter.description: URL excluding the context part to where the PoPs should be sent

Parameter.name: walletDir
Parameter.description: A separate wallet for testnet and prod will be created under this directory. It will be created (recursively) if it does not exist.

Parameter.name: cachePersistenceDir
Parameter.description: Caches will be stored under this directory. It will be created (recursively) if it does not exist.

Parameter.name: txServiceUser
Parameter.description: This is used to download transactions from the transaction download service.

Parameter.name: txServicePassword
Parameter.description: This is used to download transactions from the transaction download service.

Parameter.name: txServiceUrl
Parameter.description: This is the url to the transaction download service, without credentials. The service is hardcoded to use bitcoind's json rpc interface.
